name: Cultivate
description:
* Please be patient the game takes a while to load *

This game was created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 34, with the themes "2 Button Controls" and "Growing".

Note: this game has several story paths and accompanying endings. Multiple playthroughs are highly encouraged!

Made with:

  • Unity
  • BFXR
  • Paint.NET

Updates:

  • Fix disappearing text after tennis match
  • Small bugfix for win-condition (stats)
  • Fix arrow bounce
  • Accessibility: A/D keys recognized, text made easier to read
  • Fixed issue caused when restarting the game
